Package index

All functions

build_cell_graphs()
Build cached cell graphs for motif counting
count_motifs_graphs()
Count cell-type motifs on spatial graphs
get_motif_values()
Retrieve motif values (raw, normalized)
get_norm_counts()
Retrieve normalized counts as a single data frame
make_demo_samples()
Create a synthetic dataset for quick testing
merge_motif_objs()
Merge motif objects
motif_edger()
Differential motif testing with multiple strategies
motif_space_size()
Count possible motif labels
plot_motif_artifact_check()
Artifact check: residuals versus edge density
plot_motif_slope_test()
Slope test for geometric scaling
plot_sample_graph()
Plot a sample graph with highlighted motifs
top_motifs()
Extract top motifs from stored strategies
top_motifs_simple()
Extract top simple motifs (nodes and edges)
top_motifs_triplet()
Extract top 3-node motifs
